LanguageData.CommandAutoRepairDesc: If active, a roboticist will automatically repair this robot. Repairing a robot drains its energy.
LanguageData.CommandSelectOverseerDesc: Select the roboticist who is the overseer of this robot.
LanguageData.CommandCallBossgroupDesc:
Summon an enemy leader robot along with escorts.

If you defeat the leader robot, it will drop a special chip which you can use to advance your own robotics technology.

There are three leader robot types, each summoned a different way, each dropping a different type of chip.
LanguageData.CommandSelectAllMechsDesc: Select all robots controlled by this robiticist.
